value: Tutorial
Find a job in Nothingthere village.
You completed job. Return to Bilch, the village elder, and find out what is your next task.
Buy a fishing rod in the village and catch a fish at the coast.
You caught a fish. Return to Bilch, the village elder, and find out what is your next task.
Tom, a fisherman, is looking for some help. Talk to him at the coast.
You managed to survive a fishing trip. This is the end of this quest in current version.
How can I help?
((how )?can i )?help\??
There is a lot of things to do around here, you can start by asking around if you could do some job for someone.{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
What to do next?
(what to do )?next\??

You can always ask around, there is never enough hands to do all things. You can also try to catch some fish by yourself. Here, take this, buy yourself a fising rod and go to the coast.{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
What to do next?
(what to do )?next\??
I have just heard that Tom is going offshore and wants a helping hand. Meet him at the coast.{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
Do you need some help?
((do you )?need (some )?)?help\??
Yea, gonna set off soon. Ready?{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
Yes
yes|ready
You set off after some quick preparations. Fishing goes great for some time
column4: however the weather changes. The wind gets strong
column6: a large wave washes you overboard. Some debris hits you in the head and you lose consciousness for a some time.

value: You awake on the coast after some time.
You find yourself in a small bay
column4: covered by a piece of driftwood.

value: No
no|not|(not yet)
Sure.{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
Are you all right?
(are you )?(all right|fine)\??
Yeap, got 'urt, but ol' lady 'elped. See you made it too.{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
I'm back
(i'm )?back

Good. I see that you are hurt, but nothing that time won't heal.{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
I don't have anything to do for you now.
Tutorial - the old lady
You heard about some old lady, who helped a fisherman with his injuries. Ask around to find out how to find her
You heard about some old lady, who helped a fisherman with his injuries. She lives in the forest. It may be a good idea to go visit her.
You found the old lady. She agreed to help you if you find some herbs.
You found the old lady. You may ask her if she needs some help.
The old lady said that she may use your help - but she needs to make sure you can handle yourself. Progress the Tutorial - combat questline.
This is the end of this quest in the current version.
Who is this old lady?
(who (is )?(this )?)?old lady\??
She's old. 'elps sometimes. Lives in forest, deep. Dunno much more 'bout 'er.{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
Who is the old lady?
(who (is )?(the )?)?old lady\??
Who is the old lady?
(who (is )?(the )?)?old lady\??
Doesn't really matter. And better stay away from her, there is something suspicious her...{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
Talk to the old lady
(talk|speak)(( to| with)?( the)?(( old)? lady))?
Talk to the old lady
(talk|speak)(( to| with)?( the)?(( old)? lady))?
So, you too want some herbal tea? Sure, just bring me 3 herbs and I will be brew you some.
If you want the tea, then bring me the herbs.
OK, give me the herbs...
Good. Wait a few minutes, I will brew the tea...
Here you go.
Do you need any help?
((do you )?need (any )?)?help\??
Hmmmm... Yes, there is this thing... But I am not sure if you can handle it.
Go to the fields and ask for Mike, a man without a hand. Ask him for some fighting basics, then come back to me.
Tutorial - combat
The old lady told you to find Mike. He should be in the fields.
Mike asked you to defeat a training dummy. Talk to him about it.

Mike asked you to defeat a training dummy using a ranged weapon. Talk to him about it. *Hint: there may be some stones on the beach that are good for throwing. Remember that you may set tactic to ranged (see help for more on tactics).*
This is the end of this quest in the current version.
Can you teach me fighting basics?
(can |could |would )?(you )?(teach|train)( me)?( fighting)?( basics)?\??
Eh, okay. We will start with some melee basics. Let me know when you're ready.{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
I am ready for melee training
((i am )|(i'm ))?ready( for)?( melee)?( training)?|melee|training|melee training

Mike takes you to a prepared wooden training dummy. 
*Show me what you can do* he says
Eh, you had to try hard for that, didn't you? Talk to me when you are ready to try again.{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}

Okay, you got some basics. Let's try ranged fighting next - if you don't have any ranged weapon, try to gather some stones on the shore. 
*Hint: remember that you can change your tactic - see help for more*{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
I am ready for ranged training
((i am )|(i'm ))?ready( for)?( ranged)?( training)?|ranged|training|ranged training

Mike takes you to a prepared wooden training dummy. 
*Show me what you can do*, he says, *but this time don't get close to the dummy*
Make sure you have a ranged weapon, at least some stones from the shore. Talk to me when you are ready to try again.{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
Okay, I will let her know that you seem capable.{self.player.strings['POSSIBLE_STATE_ACTIONS_HINT']}
